title: Canopy
long_description: Canopy is a B2B client management system that has been optimized for franchise-style clients. It allows for seemless management of brands at the company or location-specific level. It features secure Oauth login, user management, update history, several searching/filtering options using an intuitive UI, and a robust API for integration with other systems. It is built using Next.js, Prisma managing a MySQL database, a Redis layer for caching data, and Bootstrap for styling.

title: UVU Feud
long_description: UVU Feud is a Jackbox-style game that allows players to answer questions in a family feud style format. It features different UIs for players, the host, and the gameboard each with unique functionality. It utilizes Socket.io for real-time communication between the host and players, and a Node.js backend to manage game state. The game is built using Vue for the frontend and Express.js for the backend with a MongoDB database. It is integrated with a Family Feud API to provide real questions and answers.

title: Slide Puzzle
long_description: This is a simple slide puzzle game that allows users to select from a variety of images to play with and sizes ranging from 3x3 to 5x5. It features a timer and a move counter to track progress. It is an entirely frontend application built using vanilla JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
